content: anniversary mandala julie yeager designs materials yarn caron anniversary cakes 100% acrylic 35 3 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m yarn weight ​ ​ #6 super bulky 1 skein peach part-ay hook l 8 0 mm crochet hook ​ size 50 127 cm diameter circle 36 92 cm in aran weight ending at round 36 additional ​ rounds in aran/worsted up to round 52 will bring it up to 56 142 cm gauge 10 ¼ 26 cm after 6 rounds 8 ¼ 21 cm in aran weight ​ pattern uses u s crochet terms copyright 2020 julie yeager designs see all at www julieyeagerdesigns com or my ravelry store contact me via e-mail at julieyeagerdesigns@gmail com ​ color a magenta color b burgundy color c peach color d orange abbreviations and special stitches chain - chain sl - slip st - stitch half_double_crochet - half-double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet space - space double_crochet - double_crochet fpsc - front post single_crochet bcl2 - beginning cluster 2-double_crochet cluster can substitute chain-2 with standing double_crochet chain 2 yo ​ insert hook in designated space yo and pull through yo and pull through 2 loops twice cl2 - cluster 2-double_crochet cluster yo insert hook in designated space yo and pull through yo ​ and pull through 2 loops x 2 yo and pull through all 3 loops on hook bcl3 - beginning cluster 3-double_crochet cluster can substitute chain-2 with standing double_crochet chain 2 yo ​ insert hook in designated space yo and pull through yo and pull through 2 loops x 2 yo and pull through all 3 loops on hook cl3 - cluster 3-double_crochet cluster yo insert hook in designated space yo and pull through yo ​ and pull through 2 loops x 3 yo and pull through all 4 loops on hook join with single_crochet standing stitch with slip knot on hook insert hook into designated stitch ​ grab yarn pull through two loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops join with double_crochet standing stitch - also can be used for bcl stitches - with slip knot on ​ hook yarn over being careful to keep this yo in place insert hook into designated stitch grab yarn pull through three loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops twice v st - v_stitch double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in same st or space ​ nv st - narrow v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same st or space ​ popcorn 5-double_crochet popcorn st - 5 double_crochet in designated st or space remove hook insert hook from front to ​ ​ back in first double_crochet grab working yarn and pull through chain 1 to tighten chain does not count as a st note i designed this mandala for one cake of caron anniversary cakes yarn i chose to cut the yarn after each color change but i designed it to have very little waste if you choose not to cut the yarn it will look a little different but have the same general
